description: A shell script for managing IoT network configurations, including setting IP rules, routes, and restarting services based on system events like 'up', 'down', or 'bootup'. It also includes functions for subnet calculation and service restarts.

methods.name: subnet
methods.description: Calculates subnet address based on IP and subnet mask, handling different mask scenarios.

methods.name: restartServices
methods.description: Restarts DHCP server and firewall services, logging the action.
